advantages.title: Why Satılıkfil?
advantages.text: Discover the Benefits of the First Digital System in the Real Estate System in Turkey!
advantages.button1: I Want to Sell My House
advantages.button2: I Want to Buy a House
advantages.text1: We are confident! Report your property, we will list your house! We will sell your house to its full value in the fastest way with our wide investor and customer portfolio!
advantages.text2: If our team of professionals can't sell your home, we'll pay you rent for each non-sale month! Moreover, even while you live in your home!
advantages.text3: Watch every process that takes place regarding the sale of your home on the Satılıkfil mobile application. You will love the easy and convenient seller panel!

advantages-rental.text1: Satılıkfil’de gördüğünüz her ilan görüntüsü profesyonel fotoğrafçılar tarafından çekilir. İlanı yalnızca Satılıkfil düzenler. Güvenliğiniz garanti altında!
advantages-rental.text2: We put an end to the villa payment period when buying an apartment! Your digital real estate solution Satılıkfil, determines the value of homes with expertise!
advantages-rental.text3: Our team sells hundreds of homes every year. Our biggest secret is our rich real estate portfolio. Only Satılıkfil finds the house you are looking for!

solution.title: For Home Owners Satılıkfil Solutions
solution.statement: We highlight the residences in our list using various digital advertising models and always address more. Moreover, at no request to additional cost! That's why your house is sold fast at Satılıkfil! Ready for innovation?

nest.title: FINDING A HOME WITH YUVA IS VERY EASY!
nest.statement: Satılıkfil shows around to only real buyers your home. Your home is safe with us from the moment we receive your key! It won't happen, but let's just say it, We covering all of the damage that may occur during the house showing process. Satılıkfil makes you feel like you are working with a professional partner. All you have to do is to follow the process using your phone from where you are!

list-inf.statement1: Sit back and wait for a call from us! We will take care of every step from the ad photo shooting to the publishing process.

career.title1: Always Young and Dynamic Working Environment with Satılıkfil
career.text: As Satılıkfil, we are a big team that is excited, young and always chasing innovations! We love to offer our customers digital real estate solutions that are becoming more and more innovative every day in their adventures of selling and buying homes! We are sure that you too will reveal your full potential in this exciting team. Contact us now, let's meet!

earn-mobile.title: What?

part1.text5: Check out properties for Elephant for Rent and earn $ 100 per published property plus 10% of the initial rent
part1.text6: If you propose $ 3,500 for a property and rent it, you get $ 450!

part2.text2: List your customer's property to a friend or neighbor of the same building.
part2.text3: Once the property is declared, you get $ 100 for the stream!
part2.text4: When leased, you earn 10% more than your initial rent!
part2.title: Questions to Post?

part3.text1: You track your results and how much you will earn per month. Your earnings are

earn-mobile.text: You record the property's address and owner's contact. By registering the property address, you can indicate your property along with the name, telephone and e-mail of the owner.

earn.title: Satılıkfil
earn.text: Satılıkfil earns! Both the seller and the  intermediary!
earn.text1: Are there homeowners around you who are not familiar with the new generation digital real estate system?
earn.text2: Meet us, let us earn you money while selling their house in the most profitable way!

advantage.item: Build your own earning system! Let us know from users around you who want to sell their home. Register your property through the membership system.
advantage.item1: Our call center calls the registered person immediately tells about Satılıkfil. If the home is listed, your promotional payment will automatically be credited to your account at the beginning of the month. Even if the house is not sold!
advantage.item2: If your recommended home is sold, earn xx% more money! It's that simple!

solution.header: How To Introduce Your Friends With Satılıkfil?
solution.title3: Please send us the property you want to sell with the contact information of the owner and we will call the owner immediately!
solution.title4: It is enough to provide the address information of the property with a short description and fill in the owner information form.

advantage2.title: One Month After The Proposed House is Listed, Your Money is in Your Account!
advantage2.title1: We introduce ourselves by meeting with the owner, then we list the house in our system. With the consent of the owner, your money will be automatically deposited into your account

customers.title: Our best happy customers talk about us!
customers.text1: As someone who prefers to invest in real estate, I must say that it is a great pleasure to meet Satılıkfil. I didn't need to do anything but follow the money flow process!
customers.text2: We had to need to dispose of our house urgently to move to a larger house. Actually, we were already convinced to complete the sale for a value much less than its value. At the last moment, we met with Satılıkfil and managed to protect our investment. We thank you!
customers.text3: It is wonderful not to be involved in the sales process at all! I was able to follow every transaction, including the instant locations of professional photographers who came to my house, from the mobile application. Thanks for Satılıkfil!

earn.contact1: To find answers to your questions, you can first visit our Frequently Asked Questions Page!

sss.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
sss.text: Satılıkfil experts are ready to hear any questions or problems you may have. Our frequently asked questions are here. If you want to report a problem, contact us now!
sss.answer1: Yes, Satılıkfil requires a fair amount of commission from the buyer and seller. For details, create your property declaration and let's meet!
sss.question2: I liked a house from Satılıkfil! When can I see?
sss.answer2: Create a visit notification via the application or web page, let's navigate together! We are there whenever you want!
sss.question3: Until when can I get a rental fee if my house is not sold?
sss.answer3: If your house, which is advertised on for sale, is not sold, you will receive a rental fee during the unsold period. No limit!
sss.question4: Will I be informed by Satılıkfil about the activities carried out
sss.question4-1: during the sale of my house?
sss.answer4: We will not bother you! You will be able to watch every activity we carry out, from photographing about your home to walk the house through our mobile application or web page. Here is real-time real estate!

advantage.title: Elephant for Hire
advantage.text: To get the rent on the day

advantage.title: You post advertisements on Rental Elephant, and you can also post advertisements for real estate, advertisements and temporary rental services.
advantage.text2: Even if the tenant is late, payment is made every 12

differences.create: Create An Ad For My Property

information.text1: Tenants in the Rented Elephant do not need bureaucracy as guarantors and security control. That's why our experts do a rigorous credit analysis that ensures our tenants are good taxpayers.
information.text2: You receive it regardless of the tenant payment.
information.text3: Powerful credit analysis in Rental Elephant.
information.text4: Protection against damage at the end of the contract.

payment.text: On a Rental Elephant you only pay when you rent!
payment.text1: You pay for the rent and discuss the value directly with the tenant. As soon as the property is rented, a monthly rental fee is charged. From the second month, 8% of the rent is charged for non-exclusive advertising or 6.9% for exclusive advertising.

direction.text: Register your property and advertise for free
direction.text1: Registration of your house or house can be done on the website or at the application Rental Fil for Owners.
direction.text3: All free. We send a photographer to your facility to take pictures (normal and 360º) and video.
direction.text4: Start taking visits and rent your home or flat
direction.text5: Sign the contract online and get the rent on time
direction.text6: You are guaranteed to receive the rental fee every 12 days without any errors. Management is with us until the end of the contract.

under.text: On a Rental Elephant you only pay when you rent!
under.text1: You pay for the rent and discuss the value directly with the tenant. As soon as the property is rented, a monthly rental fee is charged. From the second month, 8% of the rent is charged for non-exclusive advertising or 6.9% for exclusive advertising.

subheader.title: Let us pay you rent until we sell your house!
subheader.title1: Let the professionals photograph your house!
subheader.title2: Let us show you around your house!

recognize.title: Get to Know the Innovative World of Satılıkfil!

solution.title1: Satılıkfil frees you from the trouble of ‘’selling’’ your house.
solution.text1: Let the professionals do the marketing work. Selling a house requires ‘’knowing your job’’ at any time, from taking a photo to walking around the house. Satılıkfil publishes advertisements, finds buyers, deals the best bargain for you and sells your house. Which our team sell thousands of homes in Turkey and around the world, will take you to your true customer!
solution.title2: Satılıkfil earns you without selling it.
solution.text2: We are as assertive in this regard as we are willing to sell your house! Satılıkfil sells your house in a short time and pays you rent for each month he cannot sell. Moreover, you will continue to live in your home while you receive your rent payment.
solution.title3: Satılıkfil sells your house for a higher price than the other apartment.
solution.text3: We know the value of your savings and sell your house worth.
solution.title4: Satılıkfil shows your home to more people. Moreover, at no additional cost!
solution.text4: Satılıkfil advertises on various digital platforms and shows your home to more people. More views mean faster sales!
solution.title5: Satılıkfil protects the house and fulfill the damage.
solution.text5: Let you entrust your key to us and we will show around your house. We will look at your home throughout the process! We are ready to fully compensate for even the slightest damage that may occur.

block1.title: Satılıkfil Online Smart Real Estatet
block1.text: Satılıkfil sells without tiring you, without waiting and ‘’leaving your business to chance’’.
block1.label: FIFTH FLOOR SPECIAL
block1.item4: Satılıkfil in house custody assurance (possible damage coverage)
block1.item5: Rent payment for each month the house is not sold

block2.title: Traditional Real Estate
block2.text: Get rid of amateur, slow and tiring processes!
block2.label: EXCEPT FOR THE FIFTH FLOOR
block2.item2: Long negotiations and bargain in the sales process
block2.item3: Money lost until the sale takes place
block2.item4: Insecure and without guarantee house custody

listing.title: Satlıkfil Ready to Sell Your Home, Are You Ready?
listing.text5: Sign up to contact Satılıkfil experts and let us know your property. We will come to your door and collect the house key from you. While the whole process is protected by legal contracts, we will take photos of your home with our professional photographers and publish them as soon as possible. From the moment the advertisement is published, at the end of each month it is not sold, the rental fee is in your pocket!
listing.button: Click and from the mobile application
listing.button3: follow all the developments about your home instantly!
listing.title6: Digital, Innovative, New Generation and Young! Discover The Benefits Of Satılıkfil.
listing.title4: Discover the benefits of renting with us!
listing.text7: We take care of the remaining 9 items :)

media.title: WHAT DOES THE PRESS SAY ABOUT SATILIKFİL?
media.text: "Satılıkfil managed to rent a property 10 times faster than traditional real estate, on average every 4 days."

step.title: The Innovative Face of Digital Real Estate
step.text1: Sign up for free and fill out the relevant form. You can download the Satılıkfil mobile application or subscribe from the web page.
step.title2: Let's take a picture of your house!
step.text2: Let's come to take a picture of your house completely free of charge with our professional photographers. Both photo and video!
step.title3: Let's show you around your house!
step.text3: Our team, which sells dozens of homes a year, will direct a professional to your home. Let's take your house walk around for free!
step.title4: Receive a rental payment for each non-sale month.
step.text4: As long as your ad is on the air, Satılıkfil will pay you every month that is not sold!

listing.text8: Meet the Advantages of Digital Real Estate Understanding!
listing.text9: Satılıkfil offers you a sale guarantee and pays you rent every month until your home is sold. Moreover, while you continue to sit in your house! No waiting for real profit. We are confident! Our numerous contacts nationally and internationally enable us to sell your home at full value. Leave the job to the expert! Our professionals know the intricacies of selling a house, just sit back, follow everything from the mobile application.

advertisement.title: Satılıkfil Highlights
advertisement.text: How Does Advertising on Satılıkfil Work?
advertisement.text1: Everything is faced with the challenges faced by the company's founders and the owner and tenant
advertisement.sample: While selling your home, we advertise where your target audience is!
advertisement.sample1: Forget about the slow-moving, bureaucratic and time-consuming system of traditional real estate. Real estate is now more innovative, completely digital and very practical! With the housing notification you will make via the Satılıkfil system, the process will proceed very quickly. So now we have to ask:

listing.title5: Report your property, we will list it!
listing.text12: Start receiving visits immediately with our digital advertising models!
listing.text13: Satılıkfil benefits from numerous digital advertising models without additional charge and promotes your home to your entire city.

sss.text: Satılıkfil experts are ready to hear any questions or problems you may have. Our frequently asked questions are here. If you want to report a problem, contact us now!

sss.answer4: We will not bother you! You will be able to watch every activity we carry out, from photographing about your home to walk the house through our mobile application or web page. Here is real-time real estate!

reason.title: Why Should My Customers
reason.text: The Elephant for Rent is faster than traditional real estate. We take care of all the work except taking the customer around the house so that you can take care of more customers. That's why you can deal with more customers and work more result-oriented with our digital solutions.

content.title: Team management
content.text: It can be difficult to distribute tasks. Thanks to our high-tech infrastructure, you can distribute tasks and control more.
content.text1: We report to you what he thinks about your company free of charge and offer you daily. Thanks to the feedback of customers, you will constantly improve yourself.
content.text2: You can create separate accounts for each employee. You can authorize each account separately, and by distributing different tasks, everything is very orderly. We evaluate the performance of all employees according to the information we receive from the customer and publish this report free of charge on your panel.
content.text3: You can create separate accounts for each employee. You can authorize each account separately, and by distributing different tasks, everything is very orderly. We evaluate the performance of all employees according to the information we receive from the customer and publish this report free of charge on your panel.
content.text4: Everything is free here. You can have photo shoots, advertisements, call center, our software developed with the latest technology and much more without paying.
content.text5: It can be difficult to distribute tasks. Thanks to our high-tech infrastructure, you can distribute tasks and control more.

reason.title: We are the Digital
reason.text: You can control your customers' residences more easily by getting support from Satılıkfil, get rid of the business of walk around houses and have the energy and time to serve a wider audience. Combine years of experience and your customer base with our digital solutions!

percent.home: Get rid of showing around the house
percent.professional: Our professionals take a photo of the house
percent.header4: Satılıkfil earns those who make suggestions.

content.title: Professional and Expert Team
content.text: It should be carried out by every business professional in real estate. While our sales professionals take your customers' homes around, the photos will be taken by those who know digital photography best. We believe in quality!
content.text1: May our cooperation achieve success! We perform periodic analyzes and performance measurements regarding your company's home sales rates and performance and present them to you.
content.title2: Manage your business with your employees on a single platform!
content.text2: Each employee in your team can be informed and updated about their work schedule from the system. In this way, you get the chance to manage the entire process on a single platform.
content.text3: We take care of the details of the work! Our expert residential photographers in our team take decent photos that appeal to the potential buyer. This will save you time to communicate with more customers!
content.title4: Every Step Taken Regarding Houses is in Follow Up!
content.text4: Information about all residences you want to sell is automatically updated on the Satılıkfil mobile application. Is our team touring a residence? Satılıkfil will send you a notification! Has the photographer finished taking pictures of the residence? Satılıkfil informs you!
content.title5: Reach Broader Audiences With Less Effort!
content.text5: Thanks to your new generation digital real estate solution Satılıkfil you will show your customers' homes to the right target audience more often and expand the audience. This will increase your sales speed!

solition-partners.header1: Satılıkfil Recreates Real Estate with Digital Solutions!
solition-partners.header2: Get in touch now, let's start working together!

sss.title: Ask Satılıkfil!
sss.text: We have compiled the most frequently asked questions and answers for you!

questions-rental.header: Do You Have Questions About the Process of Buying a House from Satılıkfil?
questions-rental.title: Frequently Asked Questions and Answers for Buyers
questions-rental.question1: Which real estate objects can I buy from For Satılıkfil?
questions-rental.answer1: Satılıkfil has a core staff working as the sales office of many real estate housing projects in Istanbul. Contact for sale now and check out a wide range of properties, from residences to shops, to shopping malls and hospitals.
questions-rental.answer2: Of course! Deal with experts in bargaining and purchasing processes! Satılıkfil experts sell ''worth at '' properties for you. Prices are determined by our expert team after negotiations with the landlord.
questions-rental.answer3: All of the ads for sale can only be published and edited by our team. All photos in the ads are taken by our professional photographers with care. Reliable ads with the most accurate, most accurate information and details!
questions-rental.question4: Can I use the Satılıkfil on my phone?
questions-rental.answer4: Of course! Download the Satılıkfil app to your phone now and have the chance to review the postings easily and quickly.
questions-rental.answer5: Our experts, who have been in the real estate and housing sector for years and sell dozens of houses every year, are the veterans of the sector!
questions-rental.question6: Can I contact the host on Satılıkfil?
questions-rental.answer6: Yes, you can contact the landlord if you wish via your private receiver panel.
questions-rental.question7: What are the ad search tips on Satılıkfil?
questions-rental.answer7: You can find your dream home more easily by taking advantage of detailed filtering options in Satılıkfil. Type of residence, number of rooms, square meters or number of floors. Your dreams are waiting for you here!
questions-rental.question8: How can I create an appointment for the house I want to see on Satılıkfil?
questions-rental.answer8: You can create an appointment for the day and time you want with a single click through your receiver panel. The Satılıkfil team is ready to show you around the house!

questions-host.header: Do You Have Questions About The Process Of Selling Your House In Satılıkfil?
questions-host.title: Frequently Asked Questions and Answers for Hosts
questions-host.question1: How can I create an ad in Satılıkfil?
questions-host.answer1: Contact us immediately and we will get all the necessary information about your home. After a short meeting, we will visit your residence, photograph it and make the advertisement ready. You sit back!
questions-host.question2: How can I remove my home ad on Satılıkfil?
questions-host.answer2: You can remove your home advertisement at any time by contacting us. Home postings can only be edited by Satılıkfil experts.
questions-host.question3: Will the Satılıkfil give me a rental fee?
questions-host.answer3: Yes, Satılıkfil experts will deposit a rental fee into your account for each month when they cannot sell your home at the agreed price. Moreover, even while you continue to live in the residence!
questions-host.question4: How does the process of selling a house Satılıkfil work?
questions-host.answer4: Once your property is listed, we will find potential buyers and we will show them around. We sell your house at the price we have agreed with you, and we pay you to rent for each month we cannot sell. Satılıkfil makes your job easy!
questions-host.question5: Will it post my listing Satılıkfil house for sale behind other postings?
questions-host.answer5: No! Special promotion and advertising system that will show some advertisements ahead of others does not work in the Satılıkfil system. All postings appear together in a completely neutral environment. Moreover, thanks to the new generation of smart digital real estate, your residences reach a wider target audience more quickly.
questions-host.question6: How can I follow the sales processes of my home in Satılıkfil?
questions-host.answer6: Download the Satılıkfil application from the Google Play Store or App Store right now, and see all the transactions related to your home from the homeowner's panel. Photoshoots, buyer visits and much more will be visible in detail.
questions-host.question7: Can the Satılıkfil team sell my house?
questions-host.answer7: Satılıkfil many years in Istanbul, in Turkey is the project of a team specialized in the field of residential real estate sales in different cities. We are not new to this industry! Our innovative smart real estate solution is strengthened by our traditional experience and field practice.
questions-host.question8: How does the Satılıkfil reference system work?
questions-host.answer8: Do you know someone who wants to sell their house? Let us know right away and we will talk to him. Earn reference fee separately for listing and for sale of housing!

entry.title: Meet the New Generation Digital Real Estate!
entry.title1: All Houses Are Listed Worth in Satılıkfil!
entry.text: No inflated prices, everything is under our control!

topic.title: Satılıkfil Offers Solution!
topic.title2: Imagine Your Home, We Find It!

step.text1: Our successful experts in this field determine the price of each advertisement posted on the Satılıkfil.
step.text2: All the visuals and videos in the postings posted on Satılıkfil are taken by our professional photographers. No cheats, no scams!
step.text3: Only the administration can edit the postings on Satılıkfil. This way there are no misleading / deceptive or incomplete statements. What you see in the ad is what you will visit!
step.text4: Satılıkfil experts will meet you in the neighborhood where the house is located and shows around the house. You can set an appointment for any time you want. Just one click from the mobile application!

advantage.header: How To Buy A House From Satılıkfil?
advantage.title: Reliable Purchase
advantage.text1: Sign in now for hundreds of alternatives.
advantage.description1: Log into your Satılıkfil account, take advantage of the filtering options on the platform to find the most suitable house for you!
advantage.description2: We will be directing our professionals to your address at the date and time you specify. Moreover, you can follow the team coming to your home in real-time!
advantage.description3: During the purchasing process, entrust your savings to the reliable Satılıkfil sales contract!

tenant.question: Questions to Post?

costs.title: Satılıkfil Online Smart Real Estatet
costs.text: Satılıkfil sells without tiring you, without waiting and ‘’leaving your business to chance’’.

block1.title: FIFTH FLOOR SPECIAL
block1.advantage5: Satılıkfil in house custody assurance (possible damage coverage)
block1.advantage6: Rent payment for each month the house is not sold

block2.title: Traditional Real Estate
block2.text: Get rid of amateur, slow and tiring processes!
block2.label: EXCEPT FOR THE FIFTH FLOOR
block2.bad2: Long negotiations and bargain in the sales process
block2.bad3: Money lost until the sale takes place
block2.bad4: Insecure and without guarantee house custody

tenant.text: Meet the Advantages of Digital Real Estate Understanding!
tenant.text1: Satılıkfil offers you a sale guarantee and pays you rent every month until your home is sold. Moreover, while you continue to sit in your house! No waiting for real profit. We are confident! Our numerous contacts nationally and internationally enable us to sell your home at full value. Leave the job to the expert! Our professionals know the intricacies of selling a house, just sit back, follow everything from the mobile application.

sss.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
sss.text: Satılıkfil experts are ready to hear any questions or problems you may have. Our frequently asked questions are here. If you want to report a problem, contact us now!
sss.answer1: Yes, Satılıkfil requires a fair amount of commission from the buyer and seller. For details, create your property declaration and let's meet!
sss.question2: I liked a house from Satılıkfil! When can I see?
sss.answer2: Create a visit notification via the application or web page, let's navigate together! We are there whenever you want!
sss.question3: Until when can I get a rental fee if my house is not sold?
sss.answer3: If your house, which is advertised on for sale, is not sold, you will receive a rental fee during the unsold period. No limit!
sss.question4: Will I be informed by Satılıkfil about the activities carried out
sss.question4-1: during the sale of my house?
sss.answer4: We will not bother you! You will be able to watch every activity we carry out, from photographing about your home to walk the house through our mobile application or web page. Here is real-time real estate!

opportunities.header: Ready to Take Advantage of Satılıkfil Deals?
opportunities.text: Satılıkfil offers additional income with various opportunities to all its users who want to buy housing. Get to know the opportunities closely and keep winning with the digital real estate system!

block.text: it working! We have prepared all of the

items.text: Do you have acquaintances around who want to sell housing? Notify property to Satılıkfil now. Earn income from the referral campaign!
items.sell: Earn By Selling Housing With Satılıkfil
items.text1: Satılıkfil gives you a certain commission on the sale of each property listed through you. Here is the real additional income opportunity!
